[[File:Chalazion interne.jpg|left|vignette|Chalazion with internal extension to the eyelid (tarsal surface)]]

[[File:Chalazion externe.jpg|gauche|vignette|Chalazion with extension to the outer surface of the eyelid (cutaneous surface)]]

question.title: What is a characteristic of a chalazion?

option_a.title: A chalazion is a type of blepharitis.
option_a.description: A condition that causes inflammation of the eyelids

option_b.title: A chalazion is a type of keratoconjunctivitis.
option_b.description: An inflammation of the cornea and conjunctiva

option_c.title: A chalazion is a type of eyelid cyst.
option_c.description: A benign, fluid-filled sac on the eyelid

option_d.title: A chalazion is a type of eyelid tumor.
option_d.description: A benign growth on the eyelid
